trans:
July 19, 2023 - 11:48 am
Hey, I have the same problem and I'll tell you a secret that even without nuts the taste of this tart is unbeatable;)) And if you're not allergic to seeds, maybe almonds? However, as for the harmony with the quintessence of the other ingredients, I'll give the baton to the boss;))
REPLY
[redacted_name]
August 20, 2022 - 11:55 pm
Can I swap apricots for nectarines or peaches? ğŸ‘ğŸ˜Š
REPLY
DELIGHTFUL
August 21, 2022 - 3:59 pm
I'm afraid it will be too sweet
REPLY
OL[redacted_name] January 2023 - 12:42 pm
I replaced it with canned peaches and it turned out great! ğŸ™‚
REPLY
ALE[redacted_name] August 2022 - 8:52 am

REPLY
DELIGHTFUL
August 21, 2022 - 4:00 pm
The temperature is the same all the time
REPLY

REPLY
DELIGHTFUL
August 21, 2022 - 4:00 pm
Yes, you can add light
REPLY
